# Problem 1
```{r} 
data("penguins", package = "palmerpenguins")

view("penguins")

nrow(penguins)

ncol(penguins)

mean(penguins$flipper_length_mm, na.rm = TRUE)

ggplot(penguins, aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = flipper_length_mm)) + geom_point()

ggsave("penguin_scatter_plot.pdf")
```
